subject: J2EEUnit.
msgSnippet: Hi There: I m using J2EEE to test the sampleServlet.class provided J2EEUnit.sourceforge.com but it give me this error when i run the servlet. I have done all
messageBody:
Hi There:
I'm using J2EEE to test the sampleServlet.class provided
"J2EEUnit.sourceforge.com" but it give me this error when i run the
servlet. I have done all the neccessary J2EEUnit configuration !
Does anyone came across this problem while testing the
sampleServlet ? The funny thing, i don't even have a abstract or
interface class which i know this classes can't be instantiated !

Thanks,
selena

==============================================================
Error: 500
Location: /examples/servlet/TestSampleServlet
Internal Servlet Error:
